about_the_game:
Enter a dark world where every night brings terror and danger. As darkness falls, terrifying monsters emerge from the shadows, impervious to traditional weapons. Only ancient, magical runes can strike them down. Your task is to survive in this merciless world, gain power, and uncover the secrets that will save the world.

Gameplay Features:

Procedurally Generated World

Each playthrough is a new adventure. The world changes every time, offering unique locations, challenges, and secrets to discover.

Acquiring Runes and Magical Items

Explore the world, uncover ancient secrets, and collect magical runes. Each rune holds unique powers to aid you in battling the nocturnal monsters.

Survival Elements

Hunt, gather resources, and build shelter. During the day, prepare yourself to survive another night.

Upgrading Items and Runes

Craft and enhance your weapons, armor, and runes using the gems and materials you find.

Crafting and Alchemy

Discover recipes to create powerful weapons, durable armor, healing and strengthening potions, as well as meals that boost your attributes in battle.

Settlement Building and Defense

Develop your settlement into a stronghold. Construct walls, traps, and watchtowers to defend against waves of nocturnal monsters. But beware, each attack grows increasingly difficult.

Recruiting Allies

Roam the world, meet other survivors, and persuade them to join your settlement. Each ally brings unique skills that can improve your chances of survival.

Immerse yourself in the world of "After Nightfall" and see how long you can survive in the face of the darkness.
